programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Ottawa Senators
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs try to put a stranglehold on their East first-round series with the Senators in Game 3. Max Domi ripped the overtime winner just over three minutes into the first extra frame of Game 2 to give Toronto a 3-2 win, and a 2-0 series lead.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Ottawa Senators
programme.desc: The Maple Leafs look to swiftly end the Senators' playoff return, up 3-0 in Game 4 of their first-round set. Simon Benoit, who scored six goals in his first 288 NHL games, slapped home the overtime winner in Toronto's 3-2 Game 3 victory over Ottawa.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.sub-title: Ottawa Senators at Toronto Maple Leafs
programme.desc: The Senators try to continue their comeback in Game 5 of their first-round set with the Maple Leafs. Jake Sanderson saved Ottawa's season and prevented a third straight overtime loss when the defenseman scored in a 4-3 win over Toronto in Game 4.

programme.title: NHL Hockey
programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Ottawa Senators
programme.desc: The Senators continue a comeback attempt as they host the Maple Leafs in Game 6 of an East quarterfinal. Linus Ullmark made 29 saves as Ottawa blanked Toronto 4-0 in Game 5 to stay alive. Tim Stützle notched a goal and two assists for the Sens.
